sys_atf_step.description: Validate that the form matches the following condition: Short description = Persona issues and Assignment group = Agile - The Whole Group and Description = this is a renewal with 1 sku. He has the bundle added and the sku (which is not part of a persona). It will not submit for approval without adding a persona.These are the line items. The G3 Original on their account is not the G3 Unified which is part of the persona saved to Snow.JD - Yeah it's reading the Amount field on the price adjustment which is just the difference from the list price. Do we need a way to differentiate those?SS - Ummm I think so. Our catalog has all of the current pricing, whereas we have customers locked into the 'older' pricing. We need to be able to change it. and Priority = 2 - High and State = Closed Complete and Assigned to = Matthew Shaw With a failure timeout of 30 Seconds

test.display_value: ATF Generated Test - rm_defect, Chase Waggenspack, User's default view (Default view)
